wikipedia_page.main: Daniel Greco Costa (born 7 April 1989), known as Dan Costa, is a British-Italian-Portuguese pianist and composer, known for his album Suite Três Rios. He has collaborated with artists such as Ivan Lins, Seamus Blake, Leila Pinheiro, Jaques Morelenbaum and Roberto Menescal.

response: His songs have been covered by Patti Austin, David Benoit, George Benson, Michael Bublé, Eliane Elias, Ella Fitzgerald, Dave Grusin, Shirley Horn, Quincy Jones, Steve Kuhn, the Manhattan Transfer, Sérgio Mendes, Jane Monheit, Mark Murphy, Carmen McRae, Joe Pass, Lee Ritenour, Sarah Vaughan, Diane Schuur, Sting, Barbra Streisand, Take 6, Toots Thielemans, Dan Costa (musician) and Nancy Wilson.
